verses.content: Chun, Rehoboam chu Sekem khuoah a feh a, Israelhai po po chu Sekem khuoa chun ama lala siem dingin an fe ta sih a.
Chun, Nebat naupa Jeroboam chun chuong thu chu a lo hriet chun (lal Solomona inthawka a tlânhmang- na Aigupta rama la um a na, chuong- chun Jeroboam Aigupta rama la um zing chu an zûn kotir a),
Jeroboam le sipai pungkhâwm- hai po po chu an hung a, Rehoboam kuoma chun,
“I pa khan kan rîngkawl a sukrik êm hlak a, chuleiin, i pa mi sawr rimsikna le, a rîngkawl riktak kan chunga ân nghat hi mi sukzângpêk la, chuongchun, i rawng bâwl kan tih,” tiin an hung hril a.
Ama chun an kuomah, “Ni thum sûng chu lo va fe kieng phawt unla, chun, ka kuomah hung nâwk ro,” a ta. Chun, mipuihai chu an fe kieng ta phawt a.
Chun, lal Rehoboam chun a pa Solomon dam laia a kâwla um hlak upahai chu, “Hieng mipuihai hi ka dawn dân ding remchâng ieng am mi ruotpui in ta le?” a ta.
Anni chun a kuomah, “Tuhin hienghai siehlawa hin i um a, an rawng i bâwl a, anni chu i dawn a, an kuoma thu ṭhatak hril i tum chun, kumkhawtluongin i siehlawah um an tih,” tiin an hril a.
Nisienlakhawm, upahai rem- ruotpui chu a pawm nawh a, ama ruolpui tlângvâlhai, ama kâwla um hlakhai chu a râwn ta lem a.
An kuoma chun, “Hieng mipui- hai, ka kuoma, ‘I pain ka chunga rîngkawl ân nghat hi mi sukzângpêk rawh,’ tiha hriltuhai hi ka dawn dân ding rem ieng am in mi ruotpuia le?” a tih a.

Chun, ama ruolpui tlangvâlhai chun a kuomah, “Hieng mipuihai, ‘I pa khan kan rîngkawl a sukrik êm hlak a, nang chun chu mi sukzângpêk raw khai,’ i kuoma tituhai kuoma chun, hieng ang hin ti la, hieng ang hin an kuoma chun hril rawh, ‘Ka pa kâwng nêk chun ka kutte khawm hi a lien lem a.

Ka pa khan rîngkawl riktak a lo inbâttir cheu a, kei chun in rîngkawl chu ka belsa ding a nih, ka pa chun vuoknain a lo hrâwk hlak cheu a, kei ruok chun chu ainuvêtin ka hrâwk ding cheu a nih,’ tiin,” an hril a.
Chuongchun, Jeroboam le mi- puihai po po chu lalin, ni thum chinah ka kuomah hung nâwk ro tia a hril ang khan a ni thum ni chun Rehoboam kuoma chun an va feh a.
Chun, lal chun mipuihai chu inrumtakin a lo dawn a, upahai rem- ruotpui kha a pawm nawh a,

tlangvâlhai remruotpui ang khan, “Ka pa chun in rîngkawl a lo sukrik a, kei chun chu in rîngkawl chu ka belsa ding a nih, ka pa chun vuoknain a lo hrâwk hlak cheu a, kei chun chu ainuvêtin ka hrâwk lem ding cheu a nih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, lal chun, mipuihai thuhril kha a pawm ta nawh a, chu chu LALPA lei a nih, LALPA chun Silo mi Ahija hmanga, Nebat naupa Jeroboam kuoma a thu lo hril ta kha a suknghet theina dingin.

Chun, Israelhai po po chun lalin an thuhril a pawm nawh ti an hrietin, mipuihai chun, “David a hin chanvo ieng am ei nei leh? Jesai naupaa hin rohluo ding ei nei chuong bawk nawh: Aw Israelhai, in puon in tieng fe vawng ro, David, i sûngkuo chu ngai- tuo el rawh,” tiin lal chu an dawn a. Chuongchun, Israelhai chu an puon in tieng chun an fe tah a.
Israel thla Juda ram khuoa umhai chunga ruok chun Rehoboam chun ro a rêl a.

Chuongchun, lal Rehoboam chun sinthawa ruoi luihai hotu Ado- niram chu a tir a, ama chu Israelhai po po chun lungin an lo dêng a, a thi tah a. Chun, lal Rehoboam chu Jeru- salem khuoa tlân hmang tumin a taw lailîra chun a chuong kai vat tah a.
Chuongchun, Israelhai chu David sûnghai chunga chun an hung hel tah a nih, tu chen el hin.

Chun, Israelhai po po chun Jeroboam chu a hung kîr nâwk ti an hrietin, pungkhâwmnaa hung dingin an inkotir a, Israelhai po po chunga lalah an siem tah a; Juda hnam ti chau naw chu David sûnghai zui tukhawm an um nawh.

Chun, Rehoboam chun Jerusa- lem khuo a hang tlung chun, Israel sûnghai chu doa Solomon naupa Rehoboam ram la nâwk dingin Juda sûnghai po po le Benjamin hnam mi huoisen ruok thlang suok, nuoi khat le sîng riet zet ân khâwm a.
Nisienlakhawm, Pathien mi Semaia kuomah Pathien thu a hung tlung a,
“Judai ram lal Solomon naupa Rehoboam le Juda le Benjamin sûng- hai po po kuoma le mipui danghai kuoma chun,

‘LALPAIN hieng ang hin a tih, Hang fe naw rawh, Israel thla in unauhai chu hang do bawk naw ro, mâni in tieng seng fe nâwk ta ro, hi hi keima thaw a nih,’ tiin hril rawh,” tiin. Chuongchun, LALPA thu chu an awi a, LALPA thu ang chun an kîr a, an fe nâwk ta vawng a.
Chuongchun, Jeroboam chun Ephraim tlâng rama chun Sekem khuo a siem a, chutaka chun a um a, chun, chutaka inthawk chun a suok a, Penuel khuo a siem a.
Chun, Jeroboam chun a lung- rilin, “Ram hi David sûnghai ta hi a hung ni nâwk el âwm ie,

hienghairawi hi Jerusalem khuoa LALPA ina inthâwinahai in- hlân dinga an hang fe chun hienghai lungril hi an lalpa Rehoboam, Juda ram lal tieng hin thle nâwk el a ta, chuongchun, kei hi mi that an ta, Juda ram lal Rehoboam tieng an kawp nâwk el âwm ie,” a ta.

Chuongchun, lal chun mi a râwn a, rângkachak bâwngte lim, pa- hni a siem a, an kuoma chun, “In ta dingin Jerusalem khuoa hang fe chu ân tak talaw êm a, aw Israelhai, en ta u; Aigupta rama inthawka ṭhuoi suoktu cheu in pathienhai hi,” a ta.
Chun, pakhat chu Bethelah a sieh a, pakhat chu Danah a sieh a.
Chu thil chu suol a hung ni ta a nih, mipuihai chu an pahnia be ding chun Dan chen rauin an va fe hlak sih a.
Chun, bâwlhmun inhai a bâwl a, Levi nauhai ni lo, vântlâng laia mihai thiempuah a siem a.

Chun, Jeroboam chun Juda rama ruoiṭhe an nei hlak ang bawkin thla rietna, chu thla ni sâwm le ni nga ni chu ruoiṭhe niah a ruot veh a, maichâma chun an hang feh a, Bethela chun a bâwngte lim siem kâwla inthâwiin chuong ang chun an thaw a nih; chun, a siem bâwl- hmun thiempuhai chu Bethela chun a sieh a.

Chun, amain a dit anga a ruot thla ngei, thla rietna, ni sâwm le ni nga nia chun Bethela a maichâm siema chun a hang feh a, chun, Israel thlahai ta dingin ruoiṭhe ni a ruot a, maichâma riminhnik raw dingin a hang feh a.
